problem_text: In Fig. 21-38, particle 1 of charge $+4 e$ is above a floor by distance $d_1=2.00 \mathrm{~mm}$ and particle 2 of charge $+6 e$ is on the floor, at distance $d_2=6.00 \mathrm{~mm}$ horizontally from particle 1 . What is the $x$ component of the electrostatic force on particle 2 due to particle $1 ?$
